title: Emmer Real Estate Group Inc Named #1 Real Estate Team in WI
content: West Bend, Wis., The Emmer Real Estate Group Inc of West Bend WI, was named winner of a prestigious category in the Real Trends' Best Real Estate Agents in America. Jim Emmer and his team were named the Number 1 Real Estate Team in Wisconsin, and 97th in the country beating out Hundreds of other competitors to take home top honors by completing 360 closed transaction sides. The Wall Street Journal and Real Trends' announced the honor to Emmer Real Estate Group Inc via Online & Print Notifications. Details about the award can be found on the Real Trends' website at [http://realtrends.com/best-real-estate-agents-wisc...](http://realtrends.com/best-real-estate-agents-wisconsin).  In order to be in contention for the #1 Real Estate Team for Closed Transaction Sides in WI, Real Estate Agents needed to be licensed in the state of Wisconsin, and complete closed transactions during the calendar year. Contenders were judged based on the Most Number of "Closed Transaction Sides" in the state of Wisconsin. The WSJ and Real Trends' completed their conclusions via data provided by ZillowÂ„Â¢ & TruliaÂ„Â¢.   Jim Emmer, Owner & Founder of Emmer Real Estate Group Inc was pleased about the company's performance, saying:   "Â€ÂœWe are competing with a lot of great organizations across the country so I am really proud to have made the cut," said Jim Emmer, the company's owner and founder. Â€ÂœIt's always a full team effort in working to maintain great customer service and perform at our topmost level."   Emmer Real Estate Group Inc. is a full service real estate company providing premier customer service and innovative marketing strategies. The Emmer Real Estate Team has been experiencing steady growth for 29 years, and has increased its market share with many homes sold in various areas of Southeast Wisconsin each year. Â€ÂœWe have to work about a 35 mile radius to achieve the market share needed to obtain that many closed transactions in a single year," said Emmer.   Emmer Real Estate Group is continuing their success with their new office in Green Lake, WI. Jim and his two children, Laura and Kirk, have been assisting lake dwellers find their perfect home or sell their existing home on Big Green Lake.   Persons interested in learning more about the Number One Real Estate Team in Wisconsin, can visit their website at [West Bend Real Estate Agents](http://emmerrealestate.com/)
